title: Best of The Herd for Aug 13, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for Aug 13, 2020
description:
-Justin Fields has no reason to play for Ohio State in the Spring

-The Lakers path to a title is absurd

-Colin's new favorite athlete is Joe Kelly for what he said about the Astros

-Zion Williamson might be like this forever

-Dak Prescott is perfect for the franchise tag

-Colin's NBA Bubble Awards


Guest: Chris Broussard, Fox Sports NBA Analyst

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
